name: You are hot
description:
You are so hot, even the sun would burn itself on you. This NFT should only be in the collection of the hotest people around.

You would like to convey something to your loved ones. Just say it with a nft. The original way to communicate. 
In the past you would have sent a letter or a postcard. A unique piece from your vacation or a declaration of love for your crush.  With these clean works of art, you can now send original messages to your friends, family or make a statement in your own collection. Say it with a nft.
